Modern American Novellas of the Sixties. Moscow, 1971. 432 pp. Authors represented include Uell Stanley Andersen, John Updike, Saul Bel- low, James Baldwin, James Jones, Carson McCullers, Bernard Malamud, Norman Mailer, and others. No press run figures avail- able.432 Modern American Novellas of the Sixties 1971
Modern American Short Stories. Moscow, 1973. 50,000 copies.Modern American Short Stories 1973

Modern American Thrillers. Moscow, 1973. 542 pp. No press run figures available. The volume consists of Rex Stout's The Doorbell Rang, Ross MacDonald's The Goodbye Look, and John Ball's A Hot Night in Carolina.542 Modern American Thrillers 1973

Twentieth-Century Negro Poetry of the U.S.A. Moscow, 1971. 222 pp. 25,000 copies.222 Twentieth-Century Negro Poetry of the U.S.A 1971
Novy mir, no. 9 (1970). Featured a "mini-anthology" of "American poetry of protest." Most of the poets were represented by a single poem.American poetry of protest Novy mir 1970
